p: GREEN MARKET - TOP VIETNAMESE ONLINE EXPLOITATION
b1: Green Market officially entered the Vietnamese market in early 2020, with the aim of creating an intermediary classifieds channel, connecting buyers with sellers together with extremely simple and convenient transactions. Fast, safe, surprisingly effective.
b2: Up to now, Green Market is proud to be the top popular classifieds website in Vietnam. Thousands of bargains from Real Estate, Houses, Vehicles, Electronics, Pets, Personal items ... to find jobs, recruitment information, services - travel posted, advertised sold on Green Market.
b3: With Green Market, you can easily buy, sell, exchange any kind of item, whether it's old or new with many fields:
b4: Real estate: For rent, purchase and sale of real estate, apartments, office space, business premises, diverse accommodation areas, locations
b5: Means of transportation: high-durability cars and motorcycles, reasonable price.
b6: Personal belongings: clothes, shoes, bags, watches ... multi-style, trendy.
b7: Electronics: cell phone, tablet, laptop, television, speaker, amplifier ...; household electrical appliances: washing machines, refrigerators, air-conditioning ... with many different brands, sizes.
b8: Variety of pets and pets: chicken, dog, bird, cat, fish, hamster at very good price.
b9: Recruitment, jobs with millions of attractive and suitable jobs.
b10: Services, tourism: hotels, air tickets, train tickets, car tickets, tours and travel vouchers ... prestige and quality.
b11: Food: delicious, attractive processed dishes, fresh food, safe and reasonably priced.
b12: And many other items are and are being sold at Green Market.
b13: Each of us has products that are used and no longer needed. So what are you waiting for without letting it become more valuable to others. Simply take a picture, specific description of the product and use Green Market's free Posting application to get closer to the people who need it.
b14: Not only that, Green Market also provides you with information about the prices of items for you to refer to. At the same time, through the Experienced Blog, Green Market will advise and share you with useful information, tips and tricks to help you make safe and secure purchases. Green Market is also ready to assist you in any necessary case.
b15: Wish you have a great shopping experience on Green Market.
